Translations.Text: Recall lenze Abraham said Moj Lord robit this peaceful zem chranit mi moj dieta z kult idols
Moj Lord they zmylit so vela ludia. Mat rad for those nasledovat mna they belong mna. Mat rad for those disobey mna Ona bol Forgiver Merciful

Our Lord ja zaplatit part z moj rodina v this plantless valley do Tvoj Sacred Dom. Our Lord they je observe Zmluva Prayers (Salat) let zhluk z ludia converge them zadovazit for them all laskavy z ovocie they bol appreciative
Our Lord Ona zauzlit whatever my zatajit whatever my declare -nothing zatajit GOD zem nor heavens
Chvalit je GOD granting mna moj stara vek, Ismail Isaac. Moj Lord answers prayers
Moj Lord robit mna jeden kto consistently observes Zmluva Prayers (Salat) i moj dieta! Our Lord prosim answer moj prayers
Moj Lord forgive mi moj rodicia believers dni when reckoning berie miesto
